divs: sighting detailsliving within the 3 mile perimiter of the airport and base it is easy to recognize when air traffic has halted for the evening. after dinner i typically sit in front of the house with the dog and smoke. this night we wrapped up dinner a little late 7:45 pm and off to the store i went for ciggs . a 2 minute drive up the block and back. i always open my window unless it is raining. it is during this short trip that i recognized the lack of commercial air traffic . even the the base was unusually quite . the routine testing of the osprey's for some reason was not going on this evening . very quite. the big sky here was partially lit with a sliver of reflective moon. and the clouds were sparse. as usual many stars and planets viewable to the eye . as i pullled up in my van facing south returning from the store i noticed an unusually large ultra bright orb west of albuquerque over the plains. i stood in my driveway for about 2 minutes watching this large bright orb track its way steadily eastward towards the downtown area. taking in to account the environment of the evening i watched and calculated very carefully for strobes , colors and even the autoenomic effect playing tricks on my eyes it was clear to me that this was in the lower proximity of the atmosphere and was not man made>? i hollored for my partner irene to come quickly and watch > on the couch with the door open she was only 20 ' away and came out to observe this object with me for the next 4~5 minutes. she too was in amazement as it tracked over the city and towards the a\f base. i spoke freely at the time that its shape was unusual and the light it was emmitting was not at all normal . she concurrred and we continued to wath it track slowly eastward. this is the clincher>! as we observed we heard the engines of air force fighter jets ramping up to take off > as this occured the object halted mid path (we gasped at the same time) and vertically ascended \ exited the air space as it dissipated its glow. it was not of this earth. 1st time report 3rd life sighting. 1st time 1976 or so > connetquot river state park. long island about 9pm 2nd time port washington ny 2005 3a.m giant oil refinery type craft darker then the night creating a silhouette, after spotting the object once again i called to irene who not only witnessed this object with me but also witnessed the military craft in hot persuit of this huge object. gary l weiss music teacher \ audio engineer technology systems integrator 505-265-3065
